entries.message:
Event Type: Network Priority Maintenance

We are performing system changes in the Frankfurt location during the following priority network maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2021-05-13 01:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2021-05-13 05:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Frankfurt instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the priority network maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.
